Title: Login via Account Menu
Description: Verify user can access login from My Account and successfully log in

Title: Login via Account Menu
Expected Result: Dropdown menu appears with 'Log in' option.

Title: Login via Account Menu
Expected Result: User is redirected to the Login page.

Title: Login via Account Menu
Expected Result: 1. Redirected to Dashboard. 2. 'My Account' shows logged in state.

Title: Login with Incorrect Credentials
Description: Verify error message when entering invalid credentials

Title: Login with Incorrect Credentials
Expected Result: Error message 'Invalid login credentials' is displayed.

Title: Login Form Validation
Description: Verify required field validation on Login page
Steps: Leave Email and Password fields empty.

Title: Login Form Validation
Expected Result: Browser validation error indicating fields are required.

Title: Login Email Format Validation
Expected Result: Validation error regarding email format is displayed.

Title: Navigate to Register from Login
Description: Verify navigation to Register page from Login page

Title: Forgot Password Link Visibility
Expected Result: 'Don't remember your password?' link is visible.

Title: Logout
Expected Result: 1. User is logged out. 2. Redirected to home/login state. 3. Account menu updates to show public options.

Title: Register Success
Description: Verify user can register with valid details

Title: Register Success
Expected Result: 1. Registration successful. 2. Redirected to Dashboard or Login.

Title: Register Form Validation
Description: Verify required field validation on Register page

Title: Register Form Validation
Expected Result: Validation error indicating fields are required.

Title: Register Password Length
Steps: Enter password with less than 6 characters.

Title: Register Password Length
Expected Result: Error message 'Password should be at least 6 characters' is displayed.

Title: Register Existing Email
Description: Verify error handling when registering with an existing email
Steps: Enter an email address that is already registered.

Title: Register Existing Email
Expected Result: Error message 'User already registered' OR redirect to Login.

Title: Navigate to Login from Register
Description: Verify navigation to Login page from Register page
